verses.verse: "All <WH3605> the commandments <WH4687> that I am commanding <WH6680> you today <WH3117> you shall be careful <WH8104> to do, <WH6213> that you may live <WH2421> and multiply, <WH7235> and go <WH935> in and possess <WH3423> the land <WH776> which <WH834> the Lord <WH3068> swore <WH7650> [to give] to your forefathers.

"And you shall remember <WH2142> all <WH3605> the way <WH1870> which <WH834> the Lord <WH3068> your God <WH430> has led <WH1980> you in the wilderness <WH4057> these <WH2088> forty <WH705> years, <WH8141> that He might humble <WH6031> you, testing <WH5254> you, to know <WH3045> what <WH834> was in your heart, <WH3824> whether you would keep <WH8104> His commandments <WH4687> or <WH518> not.

"And He humbled <WH6031> you and let you be hungry, <WH7456> and fed <WH398> you with manna <WH4478> which <WH834> you did not know, <WH3045> nor <WH3808> did your fathers know, <WH1> that He might make you understand <WH3045> that man <WH3045> does not live <WH120> by bread <WH2421> alone, <WH3899> but man <WH905> lives <WH120> by everything <WH2421> that proceeds <WH3605> out of the mouth <WH4161> of the Lord. <WH6310>
"Your clothing <WH8071> did not wear <WH1086> out on you, nor <WH3808> did your foot <WH7272> swell <WH1216> these <WH2088> forty <WH705> years. <WH8141>
"Thus you are to know <WH3045> in your heart <WH3824> that the Lord <WH3068> your God <WH430> was disciplining <WH3256> you just <WH9201> as a man <WH376> disciplines <WH3256> his son. <WH1121>
"Therefore, you shall keep <WH8104> the commandments <WH4687> of the Lord <WH3068> your God, <WH430> to walk <WH1980> in His ways <WH1870> and to fear <WH3372> Him.

"For the Lord <WH3068> your God <WH430> is bringing <WH935> you into a good <WH2896> land, <WH776> a land <WH776> of brooks <WH5158> of water, <WH4325> of fountains <WH9407> and springs, <WH8415> flowing <WH3318> forth <WH3318> in valleys <WH1237> and hills; <WH2022>
a land <WH776> of wheat <WH2406> and barley, <WH8184> of vines <WH1612> and fig <WH8384> trees <WH8384> and pomegranates, <WH7416> a land <WH776> of olive <WH2132> oil <WH8081> and honey; <WH1706>

a land <WH776> where <WH834> you shall eat <WH398> food <WH3899> without <WH3808> scarcity, <WH4544> in which you shall not lack <WH2637> anything; <WH3605> a land <WH776> whose <WH834> stones <WH68> are iron, <WH1270> and out of whose hills <WH2022> you can dig <WH2672> copper. <WH5178>
"When you have eaten <WH398> and are satisfied, <WH7646> you shall bless <WH1288> the Lord <WH3068> your God <WH430> for the good <WH2896> land <WH776> which <WH834> He has given <WH5414> you.

"Beware <WH8104> lest <WH6435> you forget <WH7911> the Lord <WH3068> your God <WH430> by not keeping <WH8104> His commandments <WH4687> and His ordinances <WH4941> and His statutes <WH2708> which <WH834> I am commanding <WH6680> you today; <WH3117>
lest, <WH6435> when you have eaten <WH398> and are satisfied, <WH7646> and have built <WH1129> good <WH2896> houses <WH1004> and lived <WH3427> [in them],
and when your herds <WH1241> and your flocks <WH6629> multiply, <WH7235> and your silver <WH3701> and gold <WH2091> multiply, <WH7235> and all <WH3605> that you have multiplies, <WH7235>

then your heart <WH3824> becomes <WH7311> proud, <WH7311> and you forget <WH7911> the Lord <WH3068> your God <WH430> who brought <WH3318> you out from the land <WH776> of Egypt, <WH4714> out of the house <WH1004> of slavery. <WH5650>

"He led <WH1980> you through the great <WH1419> and terrible <WH3372> wilderness, <WH4057> [with its] fiery <WH8314> serpents <WH8314> and scorpions <WH6137> and thirsty <WH6774> ground <WH6774> where <WH834> there <WH369> was no <WH369> water; <WH4325> He brought <WH3318> water <WH4325> for you out of the rock <WH6697> of flint. <WH2496>

"In the wilderness <WH4057> He fed <WH398> you manna <WH4478> which <WH834> your fathers did not know, <WH1> that He might humble <WH3045> you and that He might test <WH6031> you, to do <WH5254> good <WH3190> for you in the end. <WH3190>
"Otherwise, you may say <WH559> in your heart, <WH3824> 'My power <WH3581> and the strength <WH6108> of my hand <WH3027> made <WH6213> me this <WH2088> wealth. <WH2428>'

"But you shall remember <WH2142> the Lord <WH3068> your God, <WH430> for it is He who is giving <WH5414> you power <WH3581> to make <WH6213> wealth, <WH2428> that He may confirm <WH6965> His covenant <WH1285> which <WH834> He swore <WH7650> to your fathers, as [it is] this <WH1> day. <WH2088>

"And it shall come <WH1961> about if <WH518> you ever <WH7911> forget <WH7911> the Lord <WH3068> your God, <WH430> and go <WH1980> after <WH310> other <WH312> gods <WH430> and serve <WH5647> them and worship <WH7812> them, I testify <WH5749> against you today <WH3117> that you shall surely perish.

"Like the nations <WH1471> that the Lord <WH3068> makes to perish before <WH6> <WH6> you, so <WH4480> you shall perish; because <WH6440> you would not listen <WH3651> to the voice <WH6> of the Lord <WH6118> your God. <WH8085>
